venue.name: The Farm Table at Kringle Candle

item.description:
Come enjoy a visit to the Kringle Candle factory and a delicious brunch at the Farm Table Restaurant both in Bernardston, MA. Visit the Candle factory/store about 11:30am and then lunch about 12:30pm.

https://www.kringlecandle.com/

http://www.kringlefarmtable.com/Home.html

Directions:

FROM THE NORTH

From I-91S, take Exit 28 for MA-10 toward Bernardston/Northfield. Turn right at MA-10 S/Church St/Northfield Rd. Turn left at MA-10 S/US-5 S/South St.

FROM THE SOUTH

From I-91N, take Exit 28B to merge onto MA-10S/ Church St. Turn left onto South St. (US-5)

FROM THE WEST

From MA-2 eastbound, follow to MA-10 N/US-5 N, Bernardston Rd. and turn north to South St. (US-5)

FROM THE EAST

From MA-2 westbound follow to MA-10 N/US-5 N/South St. (US-5)
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the store to browse and mabye shop before brunch.
item.name: Kringle Candle and Brunch at the Farm Table Restaurant
